summary: WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY THERE WAS A LOSS OF POWER AND THE ENGINE STARTED RUNNING ROUGH.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON AND STAYED.  THE CAR WOULDN'T GO OVER 10 MPH.  CAR WAS TOWED TO A SHOP AND WAS ADVISED THAT AN ENGINE WAS NEEDED.  THEY INFORMED ME OF A OIL PUMP BOLT COMING LOOSE AND THE ENGINE JUMPED TIME.  THEY SAID THIS IS A COMMON FAILURE ON THESE ENGINES.
